description: Updates the aftermarket listing (fast-transfer) status or listing parameters for a domain. It is also used to remove a domain listing.
availability: By default the listing status is set to NONE. If an aftermarket requests a listing towards us (e.g. because a customer listed his domain inside his aftermarket account), the status will change from NONE to REQUESTED.

paramaters.Definition: The minimum price that you're willing to accept for the domain name from a prospective buyer.
The price at which a buyer's bid will be automatically accepted after seven days if no higher bids are received. This price is binding.
The minimum price for which you are willing to sell the domain name. This price is binding.
The top-level category to which the domain name is associated. http://search.afternic.com/taxonomy
A text description of the domain name.
The domain price. If no price is to be set, please set the value as 0
The minimum price for the domain
optional - 0 = not for sale, 1 = for sale (default)
0 = make offer only, 1 = for fixed price domain (default)
